titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of Travel posters from Dept. of Community and Economic Development. Division of Travel Development, ca. 1975
Dept. of Community and Economic Development. Division of Travel Development Travel posters

profiledesc.creation: This series was processed by David Clark in 10/2000. Initial EAD encoding was completed by Elizabeth Perkes in August 2000.. Encoding system was created by Elizabeth Perkes in December 2007..
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid written in English in Latin script.
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS (Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

change.item: Finding aid reviewed for DACS and Utah Manuscript Association's EAD Best Practice Guidelines by Gina Strack.

repository.corpname: Utah State Archives and Records Service

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Dept. of Community and Economic Development. Division of Travel Development

did.unittitle: Dept. of Community and Economic Development. Division of Travel Development Travel posters
did.abstract: This series contains posters created by the Travel Council (Division of Travel Development) promoting Utah and donated by the Governor's Office of Economic Development.
did.physloc: These records are housed in the Utah State Archives' permanent storage room.

scopecontent.p: This series contains posters created by the Travel Council (Division of Travel Development) promoting Utah. The posters are titled "Bridgerland", "Canyonlands", "Castle Country", "Color Country", "Dinosaurland", "Golden Spike Empire", "Great Basin Country", "Great Salt Lake Country", "Greatest Snow on Earth", "Mountainland", "Mormon Country", "Panoramaland", and "Utah...the 4 Season Vacationland".

userestrict.p: These records are available for reproduction and use.

prefercite.p: Cite the Utah State Archives and Records Service, the creating agency name, the series title, and the series number.

acqinfo.p: These records were acquired from the creating agency through established retention schedules.
